original_text: Some of the young men from Judah that Ashpenaz chose were Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael and Azariah.
korean_text: 그들 가운데는 유다 자손 곧 다니엘과 하나냐와 미사엘과 아사랴가 있었더니

sentences.original_text: Some of the young men from Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다에서 온 젊은이들 중 몇 명이

sentences.original_text: were Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael and Azariah
